  • Classes in sorcer.core.provider used by sorcer.config 
    Class and Description
    ServiceProvider
    The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
  • Classes in sorcer.core.provider used by sorcer.core 
    Class and Description
    Provider
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed.

  • Classes in sorcer.core.provider used by sorcer.core.provider 
    Class and Description
    Jobber
    A service coordinating a Job execution by creating a runtime federation of all needed service providers to execute all component exertions of the received job.
    Provider
    This is an interface that defines how a provider interacts with other code the through the methods that are exposed.
    ProviderDelegate
    There are two types of SORCER service servers: generic service servers - subclasses of ServiceExerter - and service beans - subclasses of sorcer.core.provider.bean.ExerterBean.
    ProviderDelegate.DeploymentConfiguration
    The configuration class for SORCER providers.
    ProviderException 
    ServiceProvider
    The ServiceProvider class is a type of Provider with dependency injection defined by a Jini 2 configuration, proxy management, and own service discovery management for registering its proxies.
    Spacer
    SORCER also extends task/job execution abilities through the use of a space rendezvous service implementing the Spacer interface.
    SpaceTaker
    This is a class creates a JavaSpace taker that extends the Thread class and implements the interface LeaseListener
    SpaceTaker.SpaceTakerData
